info.name: Lateral recesses of fourth ventricle
info.description: The most lateral areas of the rhomboid fossa of the fourth ventricle are known as the lateral recesses.  The lateral foramina of Luschka are located at this point where cerebrospinal fluid leaves the fourth ventricle and enters the subarachnoid space.
info.item: /Gross/Brain stem & Cerebellum/Brain stem/8 Brain stem - dorsal view
